芙.definition: used in 芙蓉[fu2 rong2], lotus

芙蓉.definition: cotton rose hibiscus (Hibiscus mutabilis); lotus; foo yung (Chinese dish similar to an omelet)

芙蓉出水.definition: lit. lotus rises from the water (idiom); fig. to blossom (of poem or art)

芙蓉區.definition: Furong district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan
